import { Modal, ModalOverlay, ModalContent, ModalHeader, ModalFooter, ModalBody, ModalCloseButton, Button, Table, Thead, Tbody, Tr, Th, Td, } from "@chakra-ui/react" import { Features, Permissions, TableHeaders } from "./RolesData"; const EmployeeRoles = ({ isOpen, onClose }) => { return ( Employee Roles { TableHeaders.map(header => { return }) } { Features.map(feature => { return CreateReadUpdateDelete { Object.keys(Permissions).map(permission => { return {Permissions[permission].Features[feature].Create}{Permissions[permission].Features[feature].Read}{Permissions[permission].Features[feature].Update}{Permissions[permission].Features[feature].Delete} }) } }) }
{header}
{feature}
) } export default EmployeeRoles;
